comment.author: 35305344@N02
comment._content:
there is a mundane obsession with our culture in forcing ourselves to feel things that we do not feel

this diminishes an the ever diminishing quality of the human experience

without the human experience you cannot live or describe a human experience

thus its in all of our best interests to stop acting 

& to encourage the individuation process as a means to self discovery & that of others & the world

what does this have to do with this fantastic sideways image???

EVERYTHING

it's all in openness to perspective

& for me as a thinker- first & foremost this is most important

comment._content: I'm mundane, sorry! Could do with rotating!
